good.description: Good air quality is considered satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk.

moderate.description: moderate air quality, but some people may experience health effects

unhealthyForSensitiveGroups.description: Unhealthy for sensitive groups, but the general public is not likely to be affected

unhealthy.description: Unhealthy air quality, and everyone may experience health effects

veryUnhealthy.description: Very unhealthy air quality, and everyone may experience more serious health effects

hazardous.description: Hazardous air quality, and the entire population is more likely to be affected
